results.title: Statin versus ezetimibe-statin for incident atrial fibrillation among patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus with acute coronary syndrome and acute ischemic stroke
results.text_hl: We identified @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ coexisting with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@ACS@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@AIS@@@ who received @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment as the case group and the index date was the date of first use of the @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Hu WS, Yu TS, Lin CL. Statin versus ezetimibe-statin for incident atrial fibrillation among patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus with acute coronary syndrome and acute ischemic stroke Medicine (Baltimore). 2023 Jun 9;102(23):e33907. PMID: 37335632

results.title: Efficacy of High-Dose and Low-Dose Simvastatin on Vascular Oxidative Stress and Neurological Outcomes in Patient with Acute Ischemic Stroke: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel, Controlled Trial

results.title: Early outcome of acute ischemic stroke in hyperlipidemic patients under atorvastatin versus simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Early outcome of @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@acute ischemic stroke@@@ in hyperlipidemic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ under @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin-induced prevention of the increase in TNF-alpha level in the acute phase of ischemic stroke.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to evaluate the influence of early treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, an @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor, on serum @GENE_TNF @GENE_7124 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ level in @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@acute ischemic stroke@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@AIS@@@).

citations.NLM: Szczepańska-Szerej A, Kurzepa J, Wojczal J, Stelmasiak Z. Simvastatin-induced prevention of the increase in TNF-alpha level in the acute phase of ischemic stroke. Pharmacol Rep. 2007 Jan-Feb;59(1):94-7. PMID: 17377212

results.title: Combination of Thrombolysis and Statins in Acute Stroke Is Safe: Results of the STARS Randomized Trial (Stroke Treatment With Acute Reperfusion and Simvastatin).
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@Acute ischemic stroke@@@ recruited within 12 hours from symptom onset were randomized to oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg or placebo, once daily for 90 days.

citations.NLM: Montaner J, Bustamante A, García-Matas S, Martínez-Zabaleta M, Jiménez C, de la Torre J, Rubio FR, Segura T, Masjuán J, Cánovas D, Freijo M, Delgado-Mederos R, Tejada J, Lago A, Bravo Y, Corbeto N, Giralt D, Vives-Pastor B, de Arce A, Moniche F, Delgado P, Ribó M, STARS Investigators. Combination of Thrombolysis and Statins in Acute Stroke Is Safe: Results of the STARS Randomized Trial (Stroke Treatment With Acute Reperfusion and Simvastatin). Stroke. 2016 Nov;47(11):2870-2873. PMID: 27758944
